prompt: All beverage products are offered at a 50% discount.
knowledge_prompt: A 50% discount on all beverage products semantically implies that every beverage price should be reduced proportionally (i.e., halved). First locate the beverage section in the picture, then calculate a 50% discount on all beverage prices. Specifically, 18*0.5=9, 20*0.5=10, and 22*0.5=11.
